TextView.android:text:
PlanIt is a simple to-do list that helps the user get stuff done.
Users can add, organize and keep track of the things they need to do.
It also lets the user to set or schedule due dates and reminders that will alert them to ensure they never forget important deadlines.
Users can manage tasks effectively and see all the items at a glance and prioritize what most needs to be done according to timeline and importance.
PlanIt is easy to use and has a clean, simple and pleasing design to help users focus on the tasks that needs to be done without any distracting elements.
